content: Hi, I tried to get connected to the AFP, but got a time out. I wonder if it is experiencing some maintenance, and when it will be available again.
You can download it directly from here: https://foss.heptapod.net/isa-afp/afp-2023/-/tree/branch/default/thys. You have to delete the thys/etc before adding the component
Actually I usually find it easier to hg clone the stable version, as updating the version is completely obvious (hg up)
